local str = "LanAI " .. VERSION_AI

local screenSaverScreen = {}
screenSaverScreen.Name = "ScreenSaver"
local G = 255
local INC = false
function screenSaverScreen:OnRender()
	gl.glBindColor(0, G, 255)
	gl.glRect(0, 0, 1024, 512)

	gl.glBindColor(255, 255, 255)
	gl.glBindFont(Screen.TitleFont)
	local w = gl.glTextWidth(str)
	gl.glText(str, 512 - w / 2, 256 - 64)

	gl.glBindColor(255, 255, 255)
	gl.glBindFont(Screen.StandardFont)
	local w2 = gl.glTextWidth("Lanteans private AI")
	gl.glText("Lanteans private AI", 512 - w2 / 2, 512 - 54)

	gl.glBindFont(font)
	local str = tbl[math.random(#tbl)]
	local w3 = gl.glTextWidth(str)
	gl.glText(str, 512 - w3 / 2, 275)
	gl.glText(str, 512 - w3 / 2, 180)
end
function screenSaverScreen:OnShow()
end
function screenSaverScreen:Animate(cur)
	if (G <= 0) then
		INC = true
		G = 0
	elseif (G >= 255) then
		G = 255
		INC = false
	end

	if (INC) then
		G = G + cur * 100
	else
		G = G - cur * 100
	end
end
function screenSaverScreen:OnExit()
end
function screenSaverScreen:OnTouched()
	Screen:Display("Main")
end

Screen:Register(screenSaverScreen)
